title: Contracts for Symbol Send
description: For a given symbol, get the list of currently available contracts, and the latest barrier and duration limits for each contract.

currency.description: Currency for the contracts stake and payout. Optional field, defaults to USD if not passed in.

region.description: Set to 'japan' to retrieve contracts available under Japanese regulations, or 'other' otherwise.This key will be obsolete in the next version upgrade. Please set 'product_type' to multi_barrier to get contracts available under Japanese regulations.

product_type.description: Set to 'multi_barrier' to get a list of contracts with predefined trading windows and barriers for a given symbol. Default to 'basic'

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
